description: Ask questions to the SQL database

functions.name: queryData
functions.description: Useful when you need to ask in natural language questions to the database. Tables are Album, Artist, Customer, Employee, Genre, Invoice, InvoiceLine, MediaType, Playlist, PlaylistTrack, Track

parameters.name: userQuestion
parameters.description: the natural language question (not SQL). For example  how many sales?  or top 5 employees.
